SEARCH
Package am.aua.npuzzle.core

Class Tiles

java.lang.Object
am.aua.npuzzle.core.Tiles
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrayTiles, MatrixTiles
public abstract class Tiles extends Object implements Cloneable
The Tiles class represents the 15-puzzle game board. It provides methods to initialize the game state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tiles

      public Tiles(String format)
      Constructor of Tiles from an input string. The input must be in the form: "15 2 1 12 : 8 5 6 11 : 4 9 10 7 : 3 14 13 0".
      Parameters:
      format - The string representing the initial state of the puzzle.

    • Tiles

      public Tiles(Configuration config)
      Constructor of Tiles from a configuration.
      Parameters:
      config - Configuration to use

      Creates a copy of an existing Tiles.
      Parameters:
      that - The puzzle board instance to copy.

    • move

      public void move(Tiles.Direction direction)
      Moves corresponding tile in the specified direction (UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT) and increments the number of moves.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to move the empty tile.

    • getTile

      public abstract byte getTile(int row, int col) throws PositionOutOfBoardException
      Getter for the tile value at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of element.
      col - The column of element.
      Returns:
      The tile value at the specified position.
      Throws:

    • setTile

      public abstract void setTile(int row, int col, byte value) throws PositionOutOfBoardException
      Setter for a tile value at the specified position if the value is valid and unique.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index.
      col - The column index.
      value - The tile value (must be between 0 and 15).
      Throws:
      PositionOutOfBoardException
